display_long_description:
# ⚽ Welcome To The First Ever VR Soccer Club!
Join the soccer craze and become part of the ultimate hangout experience with endless possibilities for you and your friends 🤙

# ⚽ Explore a Massive Soccer Park Packed With Nonstop Soccer Fun
[media]
# ⚽ Master The Ball With Realistic Physics And Next-Level Control
[media]
# ⚽ Play 1V1 As a Team Or Team Up For 2V2 To 5V5 Matches
[media]
# ⚽ Choose Your Movement Style
[media]
# ⚽ Create And Customize Your Player
[media]
# ⚽ Climb The Ranks And Unlock Rare Cards 
[media]
# ⚽ Record Your Moves And Share Your Skills With The World
[media]

# 📍 Zones & Features
* 🏅 Main Fields - 1V1, 2v2 and 3v3 public fields
* 🏋️‍♀️Training Center - Sandbox training zone, including extra activities - Impossible Robokeeper, Soccer Dart, Target practice and Ninja obstacle course
* 👟 Kick Central - Urban free-play soccer field, Tennis soccer, Teqball tables and soccer Padel court
* 🌴The Beachside - 2v2 Bumpy beach soccer field and Beach volleyball field
* 👾Soccer Planet - Arcade zone with multiple soccer activities - Airhockey, Basketball machines, Skeeball, Giant soccer beer pong, Pool table and more!
* 🏌️‍♂️Kick & Putt - Soccer golf course with 8 stations of increasing difficulty

# 👉 Extra Features
* Create custom 2v2 to 5v5 private matches
* Team of the Week Leaderboard – Earn an exclusive TOTW Card!
* Goalie Mechanics - Save, dive and dominate

# Time To Experience Soccer Like Never Before! 🏆⚽

# 📍 Zones & Features
* 🏅 Main Fields - 1V1, 2v2 and 3v3 public fields
* 🏋️‍♀️Training Center - Sandbox training zone, including extra activities - Impossible Robokeeper, Soccer Dart, Target practice and Ninja obstacle course
* 👟 Kick Central - Urban free-play soccer field, Tennis soccer, Teqball tables and soccer Padel court
* 🌴The Beachside - 2v2 Bumpy beach soccer field and Beach volleyball field
* 👾Soccer Planet - Arcade zone with multiple soccer activities - Airhockey, Basketball machines, Skeeball, Giant soccer beer pong, Pool table and more!
* 🏌️‍♂️Kick & Putt - Soccer golf course with 8 stations of increasing difficulty

# 👉 Extra Features
* Create custom 2v2 to 5v5 private matches
* Team of the Week Leaderboard – Earn an exclusive TOTW Card!
* Goalie Mechanics - Save, dive and dominate

# Time To Experience Soccer Like Never Before! 🏆⚽
